item.title: Sentence Simplification for Question Generation
item.description: This paper was the result of work I did in the summer of 2014, during a National Science Foundation REU program at the University of Colorado, Colorado Springs, under Dr. Jugal Kalita. After I left, the project was taken over by one of Dr. Kalita’s PhD students, Feras Al Tarouti.
